alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued June 06 at 7:33PM EDT until June 06 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 313 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 10 PM EDT /9 PM CDT/ THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN INDIANA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 1 COUNTY IN SOUTH CENTRAL INDIANA JEFFERSON IN KENTUCKY THIS WATCH INCLUDES 31 COUNTIES IN EAST CENTRAL KENTUCKY ANDERSON BOYLE FAYETTE FRANKLIN JESSAMINE MERCER SCOTT WOODFORD IN NORTH CENTRAL KENTUCKY HENRY OLDHAM SHELBY TRIMBLE WASHINGTON IN SOUTH CENTRAL KENTUCKY CASEY GREEN HART LOGAN MARION TAYLOR IN SOUTH CENTRAL KENTUCKY ADAIR ALLEN BARREN BUTLER CLINTON CUMBERLAND EDMONSON METCALFE MONROE RUSSELL SIMPSON WARREN THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALBANY, BEDFORD, BOWLING GREEN, BROWNSVILLE, BURKESVILLE, CAMPBELLSVILLE, COLUMBIA, DANVILLE, EDMONTON, FRANKFORT, FRANKLIN, GEORGETOWN, GLASGOW, GREENSBURG, HARRODSBURG, JAMESTOWN, LA GRANGE, LAWRENCEBURG, LEBANON, LEXINGTON, LIBERTY, MADISON, MORGANTOWN, MUNFORDVILLE, NEW CASTLE, NICHOLASVILLE, PROVIDENCE, RUSSELLVILLE, SCOTTSVILLE, SHELBYVILLE, SPRINGFIELD, TOMPKINSVILLE, AND VERSAILLES.
